bool compare_elem_alpha ( DOMNode *  first,
DOMNode *  second 
)

This function is used to compare two strings alphabetically; used for sorting

Parameters
firstfirst item to be compared
secondsecond item to be compared
Returns
true if first comes before second alphabetically false otherwise
